details.description: Swap names with the player who's turn it is next for the rest of the game.  Whenever ANYBODY calls either of you by your former name they take one sip.
All players take one sip.
Don't show your teeth with your lips only until your next turn! Take a sip each time you show those pearly whites.
Down the rest of your drink and nominate three sips, or take three sips.
No players can say the word 'DRINK' for the rest of the game otherwise you CONSUME.
No calling players by their first name FOR THE REST OF THE GAME. Last names only or take one sip.
A tiny invisible man started living on the rim of your vessel.  Help him off before your COMPULSORY sips, and help him back on afterwards.  Take one sip every time you forget!
You must move in slow motion until your next turn.  Get caught forgetting and take a sip each time!
Guys take one sip.
Girls take one sip.
Take 1, 2, or 3 sips.  All players must match you!
Keep your eyes closed until your next turn. Only open them for games that require vision, else take one sip each time you're caught.
Repeat the last word of every sentence you say for the rest of the game! Forget, and take one sip.
You're the webcam master until your next turn. Cover your webcam any time BETWEEN TURNS and MAXIMUM ONCE PER TURN. The last person to cover theirs takes one sip
You now have little T-rex arms until your next turn! Your elbows are not allowed to leave your torso.  If you forget or they come off, take one sip!
Every time you or the next player has to take a sip, the buddy has to as well until your next turn.
Applaud every time someone has to drink until your next turn! Forget to applaud and take one sip.
Whoever has the tightest pants or jeans takes one sip.
Challenge the next player to a best of three.  Loser takes three sips!
You can only speak in three word sentences until your next turn. Take one sip each time you forget.
Chug the rest of your vessel. Owww it hurts I know.
You are the question master. If you ask someone a question and they answer you, they take one sip. They are allowed to respond only with "@#$% off" or by asking a question back.
You are the Rule Master. Create a rule that everyone must follow including yourself. Failure to follow the rule results in a sip for that player.
Never drink alone... except now... drink alone now. Take one sip.
From now on all players must only drink with their left hand and their pinky finger must be removed from the vessel like a "proper lady". Failure to do so means take a sip.
Don't speak until your next turn.  Any utterance, even an "mmm" results in a sip, so quiet!
Have a couple of sips just for yourself.
Have a few sips just for you.
Choose your victim for one sip nomination.
Choose one victim or spread your two sip nominations out.
Choose one victim or spread your three sip nominations out.
Speak with a lisp until your next turn! If you get caught breaking character... take one thip.
Tell one truth and two lies in a random order. Everyone locks in their guess for the truth. Anyone who doesn't get it right takes a sip and you sip for everyone that does!
Dance like a robot from the 80's for 30 seconds without breaking character or take three sips.
Strip one item of clothing or take one sip.  Shoes, socks, and jewellery don't count.
Strip two items of clothing or take two sips.  Shoes, socks, and jewellery don't count.
Strip three items of clothing or take three sips.  Shoes, socks, and jewellery don't count.
Put on some lipstick or take three sips.
Draw on a stylish pencil moustache, or take two sips.
Attempt Michael Jackson's "moon walk" and other classic Michael moves for 30 seconds without breaking character or take three sips.
Straight back, chest to the floor.  From the knees if you choose.  5 good push-ups or take one sip.
Straight back, chest to the floor.  From the knees if you choose. 10 good push-ups or take two sips.
Straight back, chest to the floor. From the knees if you choose.  15 good push-ups or take three.
Name seven alternative or slang words for penis in one minute or take two sips.
Name seven alternative or slang words for vagina in one minute or take two sips.
Name seven alternative or slang words for breasts in one minute or take two sips.

Going in order, count upwards from 1 as a group.  However, noone can say a multiple of seven or any number with a seven in it! Clap instead.  E.g 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, clap, 8, 9... If you mess up, take two sips.

Say any random object. The next player must say your object and then add their own. players must keep repeating the growing list in order and adding their own objects until someone can't remember the sequence. Loser takes three sips!

You say: "A ship came into the harbour carrying a cargo load of..."  then name a category of things and a thing from that category e.g. types of fruit, banana.  Each player says a new thing from the category on their turn.  Hesitate for five seconds or say something that's already been said and they take two sips.

Start a rhyme off (or just say a word if you're not much of a rapper).  Each player then has to rhyme with that.  Repeat a word or can't think of one and take two sips.  Words that sound the same but have a different meaning are ok.
Think of something that you've never done but you think some other players have. Everyone who's done it has to take a sip.

Play starts with you and continues around the group in order. Each player says "Fuzzy Duck" until someone says "Duzzy". Then play reverses and players have to say "Ducky Fuzz". Play can be reversed again at any time when someone says "Duzzy".  Stuff it up and and take two sips!
